review: This is amazing! We tried this recipe for the first time tonight, and it’s definitely a keeper! It was very easy to make and so full of flavour. Thank you!
This is my favorite lunch to make for work! It is sooo good and surprisingly filling. Still trying to figure out how to be less messy eating it!
I made these on Saturday – O.M.G. Amazing. I could literally eat these everyday for every meal. And they were super easy to make, too. Thank you for sharing this incredible, life-changing recipe!
This recipe is amazing! So easy to make and the flavors are very complex. Unlike anything I’ve made before. Absolutely love it!
Absolutely delicious, one of the best recipes I’ve ever tried – and it’s simple! Would highly recommend.
I have made this several times now and it always comes out great!! I am so nervous about cooking but this recipe is a piece of cake.
Oh my goodness this was SO good! We made these for dinner and I literally cannot wait to make another tomorrow
This was so easy and DELICIOUS. We had it on a weeknight. I was able to find all of the ingredients at our regular big chain grocery store. We’ll definitely be enjoying this again soon.
This was amazing, will be adding this to the rotation for sure, and so easy!!!
I received the email for these last night and knew this had to be dinner tonight! Holy moly! So much flavor and so easy! Another hit!
It is absolutely mind-blowingly delicious! And what makes it even better is how easy it is. I can’t wait to make this again!
Omg this is just…. EVERYTHING. Thank you so much for bringing us this absolute superstar.
AMAZING!! I made this as a treat and it was perfect. Simple to make and taste delicious.
This was such an indulgent, delicious combination that I would’ve never thought to try!
**applause** I have never left a comment for a recipe before, but good GOLLY Ms. Molly this deserves the highest of fives. Make the recipe. Just do it.
